sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { Segment, Sidebar, Divider,Menu, Header, Button, Grid, List, Icon, Popup, Modal, Form } from 'semantic-ui-react'

class SidePanelLeft extends React.Component{

    state = { activeItems: 'NewsFeed',
              modalOpen : false          
  };
    handleItemClicked = (e ,{name}) =>{
      this.setState({activeItems : name})
    }

    createChannelClicked = e =>{
      e.preventDefault();
      this.setState({modalOpen: true})
    }

    closeModal = e =>{
      e.preventDefault();
      this.setState({modalOpen: false})
    }

    render(){
        const {activeItems,modalOpen} = this.state;
        return(
         
        <Grid centered>
          <Grid.Column textAlign='center'> 
            <Menu   
            fixed='left'
            vertical
            style={{ background: '#e7e7e7', top: '80px'}}
            color='black'
            pointing
            borderless
            size='huge'
          
            >
            
            <Menu.Item 
              name='NewsFeed'
            
              active={activeItems === 'NewsFeed'}
              onClick={this.handleItemClicked}
              color='green'
            />
            <Menu.Item 
              
              name='Channels'
              active={activeItems === 'Channels'}
              onClick={this.handleItemClicked}
              color='green'
            >
              Channels
              {activeItems === 'Channels' ? 
                
                <List  animated selection celled size='medium' style={{marginTop: '20px' , overflowY: 'scroll' ,overflowX: 'hidden', overflowY:'hidden' }}  >
                  
                    
                    <Popup
                      style={{opacity: 0.5}}
                      inverted
                      mouseEnterDelay={700}
                      position='top center'
                      content='Create Your Channel'
                      trigger={
                      <Button basic fluid animated='vertical' onClick={this.createChannelClicked}>
                      
                        <Button.Content hidden>
                        
                          <Icon name='add' />
                        </Button.Content>
                        <Button.Content visible>
                           Create Channel
                        </Button.Content>
                      </Button>}
                    />
                  <List.Item style={{textAlign: 'left' ,marginLeft: '10px'}} onClick={() => console.log("object")} >
                    <List.Content>
                      <List.Header >#Lý </List.Header>
                    </List.Content>
                  </List.Item>
                  <List.Item style={{textAlign: 'left', marginLeft: '10px'}} onClick={() => console.log("object")} >
                    <List.Content>
                      <List.Header >#Toán </List.Header>
                    </List.Content>
                  </List.Item>
                </List>
                 : ''
                 
              }
              </Menu.Item>
            
          </Menu>
          <Modal dimmer='inverted' open={modalOpen}> 
              <Modal.Header>Create Channel</Modal.Header>
              <Modal.Content>
                <Form widths='equal' >
                  <Form.Input required placeholder='Channel Name' />
                
             

                  <Form.Field required >
                    <input placeholder='Descriptions'/>
                  </Form.Field>
                  <Form.Field>
                    
                  </Form.Field>
              
                </Form>
                
              </Modal.Content>
              <Modal.Actions>
                  <Button inverted color='green'>Create</Button>
                  <Button inverted color='red' onClick={this.closeModal}>Cancel</Button>
              </Modal.Actions>

          </Modal>
          </Grid.Column>
        </Grid>
       
        )

    }
}

export default SidePanelLeft;
